item.content:encoded: Photos of an eerily empty New York #IRENE http://t.co/ehoxvK3 New Yorkers are battening the hatches as Hurricane Irene bounds up the East Coast. item.content:encoded: Fluid personal communication in the era of Facebook, Skype and Google+: This week’s announcement of Sky... http://t.co/stdmK5P #privacy Skype’s acquisition of GroupMe and Facebook’s Beluga-based Messenger are part of something much bigger than group text messaging: The landscape of personal online communication is changing. item.title: Hurricane IRENE Forecast Discussion
item.description: Hurricane IRENE Forecast Discussion Number 30: Issued at 500 PM EDT SAT AUG 27 2011 http://t.co/ftic8xu #TSmawx
item.content:encoded: Hurricane IRENE Forecast Discussion Number 30: Issued at 500 PM EDT SAT AUG 27 2011 http://t.co/ftic8xu #TSmawx THE CENTER OF IRENE HAS BEEN MOVING ACROSS EASTERN NORTH CAROLINA THIS AFTERNOON...AND THE RADAR PRESENTATION OF THE INNER CORE ACTUALLY IMPROVED FOR A FEW HOURS. SINCE THAT TIME...THE RAGGED EYE HAS FILLED IN BUT THE CENTER REMAINS WELL DEFINED ON RADAR...WHICH WARRANTS A RETURN TO TWO-HOURLY INTERMEDIATE ADVISORIES. AN AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORTED PEAK FLIGHT-LEVEL WINDS OF 85-90 KT TO THE EAST OF THE CENTER DURING THE PAST FEW HOURS...AND A VERY RECENT CENTER DROP MEASURED A MINIMUM PRESSURE OF 950 MB. THERE HAVE NOT BEEN ANY RECENT SFMR DATA...BUT BASED ON THE EARLIER SHARP DISCREPANCY BETWEEN THE FLIGHT-LEVEL AND SURFACE WINDS...THE INITIAL INTENSITY IS REDUCED TO 70 KT. A SLOW WEAKENING IS EXPECTED AS IRENE MOVES ALONG THE COAST OF THE MID-ATLANTIC STATES DUE TO LAND INTERACTION...COLDER WATERS...DRY AIR ENTRAINMENT...AND INCREASING SOUTHWESTERLY SHEAR. BECAUSE THE LARGE WIND FIELD WILL TAKE TIME TO SPIN DOWN...HOWEVER...IRENE IS STILL EXPECTED TO REACH THE NEW YORK AREA AT OR NEAR HURRICANE STRENGTH. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: noaa.gov
